title: 我掌握了无线无限距离红石传输！！发金币！！！
author: htl2580007hhh
txt_content:
本帖最后由 htl2580007hhh 于 2013-5-21 17:46 编辑 

绝对原创！！


That's so cool! i finally got the Wireless Redstone connector! for celebrating this, i've got some gold for u guys!


and for this 'great' invention(i think it's great:P), i'll just pause the making of the station ST. JS, and just make a game by this invention!


i'll keep quiet on this till the game is made:P

and to make this less 'water', this is another reason that i'm going to get u guys some gold


表示太激动，用英文写了。。


大概是这样，我已经研究完成无线红石传输，并且制作了一个游戏，所以，我要延迟车站的制作。


炫耀一下本人英文:P


为了不要让帖子太水，我要发金币给大家
